name: Candleungeon
description:
Your burning candle must find its way to the next stage of the dungeon in this 2D roguelike.

Concept

You have two life bars: your candle HP and your flame HP. 

Your candle acts as long-term HP and diminishes with time.

Your flame bar serves as short-term HP and is used to shoot fireballs at enemies and to see in the dark.

The more flame you have, the faster your candle burns.

Controls

  • Accept: Mouse Click or Enter or Spacebar / X (PS4 controller)
  • Move: WASD / Arrow keys / Left Joystick
  • Aim: Mouse / Right Joystick
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button / R1 or R2 (PS4 controller)
  • Dodge: Right Mouse Button or Spacebar / L1 or L2 (PS4 controller)
  • Pause: Escape / Options Button
  • Accept deal: E / X (PS4 controller)

Current issues

The web version is still bugged for the player sprite. Please download the Windows version for an optimal experience. Be also aware that the save system needs to be fixed for the Windows version, because it does not load your past game when you quit.
